mapper.sql: ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INCOME_LOG_TYPE, INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED, CHANGED_INCOME, INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED, CHANGED_TITILE, CHANGED_DETAIL, STAT_DATE, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, OLD_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP
mapper.insert: insert into PNT_INCOME_LOG (ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INCOME_LOG_TYPE, INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED, CHANGED_INCOME, INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED, CHANGED_TITILE, CHANGED_DETAIL, STAT_DATE, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, OLD_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{incomeLogType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{incomeBeforeChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changedIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomeAfterChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changedTitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changedDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oldModifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update PNT_INCOME_LOG
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
INCOME_LOG_TYPE = #{incomeLogType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED = #{incomeBeforeChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGED_INCOME = #{changedIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED = #{incomeAfterChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGED_TITILE = #{changedTitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGED_DETAIL = #{changedDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT_DATE = #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OLD_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{oldModifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update PNT_INCOME_LOG set ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INCOME_LOG_TYPE = #{incomeLogType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED = #{incomeBeforeChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGED_INCOME = #{changedIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED = #{incomeAfterChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGED_TITILE = #{changedTitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGED_DETAIL = #{changedDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT_DATE = #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OLD_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{oldModifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INCOME_LOG_TYPE, INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED, CHANGED_INCOME, INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED, CHANGED_TITILE, CHANGED_DETAIL, STAT_DATE, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, OLD_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP from PNT_INCOME_LOG
SELECT SUM(CHANGED_INCOME) AS changeIncomeTotal FROM PNT_INCOME_LOG WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DATEDIFF(STAT_DATE, NOW()) = - 1 AND INCOME_LOG_TYPE = 1
